Method类：http://www.51gjie.com/java/796.html</p>\n<p>3、反序列化漏洞分析（CVE-2020-2555）：https://lucifaer.com/</p>\n<p>今天的文章分享，小伙伴们看懂了吗？</p>\n","descriptionType":"text/html","publishedDate":"Thu, 03 Sep 2020 02:17:01 +0000","feedId":5124,"bgimg":"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image1.png","linkMd5":"60903b9f30320827eb23357673a8ed16","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn48@2020_5/2020/09/05/07-08-50-074_9f762f7c5c06b13b.webp","destWidth":900,"destHeight":383,"sourceBytes":449609,"destBytes":31548,"author":"i春秋聚集地","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image1.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn48@2020_5/2020/09/05/07-08-50-074_9f762f7c5c06b13b.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image2.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn82@2020_3/2020/09/05/07-09-08-344_0f1af99cfe66baf6.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image3.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn43@2020_2/2020/09/05/07-09-10-319_ac0c7221fcbc09a5.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image4.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn89@2020_5/2020/09/05/07-09-11-404_9973d775b8fdd65c.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image5.png":null,"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image6.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn20@2020_4/2020/09/05/07-09-01-517_4d6623a0f7eb25a3.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image7.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn72@2020_5/2020/09/05/07-09-02-118_98377e88f243bd0d.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image8.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn32@2020_4/2020/09/05/07-09-06-892_24014e7050f8071c.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image9.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn43@2020_5/2020/09/05/07-09-20-940_1617dce5b2ce1437.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image10.png":null,"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image11.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn44@2020_1/2020/09/05/07-09-16-733_3452f4a5b902148d.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image12.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn86@2020_6/2020/09/05/07-09-18-233_f96f8c748bbc7a27.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image13.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn26@2020_2/2020/09/05/07-09-21-071_8071c4bbb2bd0faf.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image14.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn98@2020_3/2020/09/05/07-09-17-946_fa43279d8bfe1b16.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image15.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn35@2020_6/2020/09/05/07-09-16-718_e9bca114e3245086.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image16.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn98@2020_3/2020/09/05/07-09-22-391_7bf4b71100b443bd.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image17.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn48@2020_3/2020/09/05/07-09-19-469_979cc86112393347.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image18.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn45@2020_4/2020/09/05/07-09-26-570_170d2d06e5751337.webp","https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image19.png":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn92@2020_4/2020/09/05/07-09-25-273_7d76f629ff520f46.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1599289725395},{"createdTime":"2020-09-05 15:08:45","updatedTime":"2020-09-05 15:08:45","title":"CSDIsummit中国软件研发管理行业技术峰会|拥抱：与时俱进的中国企业进化","link":"https://www.secpulse.com/?p=140191","description":"<p style=\"text-align:center\"><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 19px\">CSDIsummit<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">中国软件研发管理行业技术峰会</span><span style=\"font-family:Times New Roman\">|</span></span><span style=\";font-family:宋体;font-size:19px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">拥抱：与时俱进的中国企业进化</span></span></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:12px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">作者</span> | <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">董笑含</span></span></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:12px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">观点参考</span> | <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新基建、数字化转型、阿里云原生、腾讯云原生</span></span></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:12px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">出品</span> |&#160;<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">百林哲（</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">id:bailinzhetraining</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">）</span></span></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">导读：</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">改革开放</span>40<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年以来，中国是最大规模超前基础设施的受益者，抓住了改革开放和全球化的红利。没有适度超前的基建，不会有中国制造强大的竞争力；没有超强的宽带建设，不会有互联网经济的繁荣发展。过去</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">40</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年我们探寻高速增长模式，接下来我们沿着</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">中国企业进化</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，实现高效价值创造。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">2020<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年春节期间，疫情在国内蔓延，举国上下共同抗击，使得疫情在两个月左右被有效控制，但海外疫情从</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">月下旬大面积爆发，意大利、美国、西班牙、德国、法国等成为重灾区。全球经济深度衰退，类似于</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2003</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">非典</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">和</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2008</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年国际金融危机的叠加。</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">2</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">月</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">19</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">日</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">-3</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">月</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">20</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">日，美、英、法、德的股市累计下跌</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">30%</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，美股</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">10</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">天内四次熔断，债券抛售，流动性危机通常是金融危机的前兆，期间大规模的刺激计划，力度超过</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">08</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年的金融危机。疫情对全球正常生活秩序的冲击，诸多国家采取</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">封城</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">封国</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">停工停学等措施。美、欧经济衰退从</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">贸易、上下游产业链、金融市场、外需</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等渠道对中国进行传导。企业需要做好充分的应对和准备。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;color: #3E3E3E\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新基建是应对经济金融危机、化危机最简单的办法</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新基建推动中国经济高质量发展、满足人们生活的软硬件基础设施。新时代产生新需求，提出新要求，凡是符合未来新时代经济社会发展需要的基础设施都属于</span>“<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新基建</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图1-结构1.jpg\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图1-结构1.jpg\" title=\"图1-结构1.jpg\" alt=\"图1-结构1.jpg\"/></a></span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">20<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年前中国的新基建是铁路、公路、机场、桥梁等，未来支撑中国经济繁荣发展的新基建是</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">拓展</span>5G<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">应用、</span><span style=\"font-family:Times New Roman\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、数据中心、工业互联网等科技领域的基础设施，以及教育、医疗等</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">消费升级重大民生领域的基础设施。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">在投资领域，传统基建上大力发展特高压、</span>5G<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、工业互联网、智慧城市、城际高速铁路、轨道交通、大数据中心、新能源充电桩、教育、医疗等新型基建，发展创新型产业，培育新的经济增长点。基础设施最终是为人口和产业服务，未来城镇化的人口将更多的在城市群和都市圈，轨道交通、城际铁路、教育、医疗、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等基础设施将面临短缺，适度超前的基础设施建设能够最大化提升经济社会效益。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">在产业政策方面，新基建也将纳入国家战略和各地经济社会发展规划中，需要新的配套制度变革，需要不同于传统基建的财政、金融、产业等配套制度支撑。在贷款、多层次资本市场、并购、</span>IPO<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、发债等方面，推动规范的政府和资本合作。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">以数字技术为核心的</span>“<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新基建</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，不仅仅在经济社会发挥作用，未来将成为促进经济增长与转型的新动能。从需求看，新基建应更好地服务于消费升级；从生产看，新基建需要为中国创新发展、绿色环保发展，抢占新一代信息技术制高点创造基础条件；</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">从科技发展看，</span>ICT<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">产业是智能社会的基石，也是科技竞赛的制高点。</span></span></strong></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">大势所趋</span>,<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">企业抉择的数字化转型</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"></span></span><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图2-结构2.jpg\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图2-结构2.jpg\" title=\"图2-结构2.jpg\" alt=\"图2-结构2.jpg\"/></a></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">伴随物联网和传感器技术的应用，工业软件的不断进化，数据的采集、存储、传输、展现、分析与优化都具有良好的技术基础，数字化转型的势态也席卷全国。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">全球范围内大数据、云计算、物联网、人工智能、</span>5G<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等新一代信息技术为核心的新一代科技革命和产业变革加速，</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">中国进入了高速增长阶段向高质量发展阶段的转变</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">。</span></span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">在这个时期，数字化转型可以助力新一代信息技术产业发展，带动企业效率提升，同时，从供给侧为实现高质量发展提供有效的支持。因此，数字化是紧迫性的、必要性的。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">数字化转型不是技术转型，准确的是客户驱动的战略性业务转型，</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">不仅需要实施数字技术，还需要牵涉各部分的组织变革。包括人、投入产出、知识与能力、财务、企业文化是否能接受或适应转型等进行分析和思考。对标行业标杆，制定每一个阶段的目标。更是一种思维方式的转型、甚至颠覆。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">企业通过数字化转型会创造出新的商业模式和数字化产品，创造新的价值。主要体现在产业数据资产化，实现数据的直接或者间接变现；延长产业链、拓展产业范围，如大数据为核心催生的数据挖掘、分析预测服务、决策外包服务等；利用数字化技术应用创造服务新业态，激活组织动能。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">传统企业的数字化转型需要结合企业自身案例痛点进行细分，互联网企业和技术公司可以赋能，微软就是一个传统企业转型的案例，他们的优势和核心的基因不是一个软件公司，是一个平台公司是一个赋能别人的公司，而不是一个互联网企业，结合自身的特点找到一条自身数字化转型的发展道路。</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">通过连接和数据去改变用户体验，通过新的交互方式重塑产品和服务。</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">大部分的企业拥有自我变革的能力，缺少主动变革的意愿，依赖传统的优势已经无法应对当下的数字化时代。传统企业有很多人才、产业链布局和行业经验，只要不断革新自己，建立数字化能力，结合自身的行业业务流程、模式等沉淀，与数字化融合，一定可以成功实施数字化转型的战略目标。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:16px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">重塑软件生命周期：</span>&#160;&#160;<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">企业探索云原生架构转型落地</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生标志性的四大事件</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\";text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;</span></strong></p>\n<p style=\";text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">1</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: 宋体\">.</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生技术关注重心在上移，</span>serverless<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">和应用管理重点</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">应用的定义和配置、发布和线上的自动化运维，成为开发和运维人员关心的核心内容。阿里和微软联合推出的</span> Open Application Model (OAM) <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">就是这个方向的一个重要项目。作为云原生技术的延伸，无服务器计算（</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Serverless</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">）将进一步释放云计算的能力，将安全、可靠、可伸缩等需求由基础设施实现，使用户仅需关注业务逻辑而无需关注具体部署和运行，极大地提高应用开发效率，同时这个方式促进了社会分工协作，云厂商可以进一步通过规模化、集约化实现计算成本大幅优化。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:16px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\">2</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\">.</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生技术成为云服务商的创新和竞争力的主阵地</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">容器会很快成为云和用户的基本界面，对于云的服务提供商来说，基于容器、微服务、无服务器、服务网格等新型云原生技术的领域，必将是云厂商未来创新和竞争力的主阵地。虚拟化未来</span> 3 <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">年还会是云上资源增量的主体，但是硬件虚拟化加速的裸金属和安全沙箱容器的组合，正在加速企业的上云和容器化过程。云厂商未来技术竞争力的关键，在云传统的优势包括规模、稳定性、成本发挥到极致的前提下，必将通过云原生技术和产品的持续创新来服务客户来获得客户的认可。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\">&#160;</span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\">3</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\">.</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生从数据中心走向云边端一体化</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生技术起源于数据中心内的应用和服务，并在过去几年逐渐扩展到边缘场景甚至端上的计算。相信未来随着</span> 5G/IoT <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">的快速发展，云边端一体化的云原生技术将深入更多的企业和更丰富场景，将无处不在。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:16px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\">4</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\">.</span></strong><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生将经历企业落地之痛，云原生上云将成为趋势</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云的技术发展会领先于企业落地的速度。尽管云原生技术已经被广泛接受，其在企业技术栈的落地仍然需要时间，如容器化过程中改变传统虚拟机模式下的运维习惯，企业传统应用分布式微服务化的改造涉及</span> re-architecturing <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等因素。运维管理含有丰富组件并快速演进的云原生的基础设施也对企业 </span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">IT </span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">人员的技术技能提出了更高的要求。然而我们相信，云原生技术带来的资源成本降低，研发运维效率提升等巨大价值，会驱动企业迎接这些挑战。在此，使用云原生上云，基于容器和服务网格等标准界面和混合云方案，将极大的降低迁云复杂度，使企业可以更快迁移到云上标准服务。通过云原生上云最大化使用云的能力，高效的社会分工，使企业聚焦于自身业务发展，相信将成为企业的共识。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:16px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生七大技术趋势</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-left: 28px\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">1.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">Serverless <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">将进一步从偏离线业务进入在线业务。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">2.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">Service Mesh<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">分布式应用能根据需要在多云和混合云上方便部署。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">3.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">互联网规模化场景中实实在在的技术主角</span>Kubernetes<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">， 在企业生产环境中大规模落地的最后一公里。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">4.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">传统云计算中心集中存储、计算的模式已经无法满足终端设备对于时效、容量、算力的需求，边缘计算将云计算的能力下沉到边缘侧、设备侧，并通过中心进行统一交付、运维、管控，将是云计算的重要发展趋势。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">5.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">容器实例和容器引擎：通过容器实例作为底层运行实体可以让用户专注于构建自身的业务和服务，无需再配置和管理服务器，摆脱基础设施运维的复杂性。同时通过真正的按需付费和实时扩容来降低用户的使用成本；软硬件的共同发展会让主流的容器引擎都具有更好的隔离性。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">6.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">基础架构演进：底层调度系统全面升级到云原生</span> Kubernetes + <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">轻量级容器架</span></span><span style=\";font-family:宋体;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">构</span></span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">演进，并且大规模部署在神龙裸金属实例上；同时基于</span> kata-container <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">的安全容器运行时技术趋于成熟，已经具备大规模铺开的条件。经济体全面走向</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Serverless Infra.</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">架构将会基于神龙</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">+</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">安全容器架构，通过构建软</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">/</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">硬多租户能力，弹性能力和高度的容器自愈能力，为用户提供极致的安全、稳定、隔离性的用户体验。同时底层资源池共享也能有效提升整体资源利用率，并池后资源互通将会有效降低整体机器成本。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">7.&#160;</span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">应用开发演进：云原生</span>+<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">智能化将成为下一代研发平台最重要的两个特性，它将进一步降低开发者采纳复杂技术的门槛以及通过工具释放生产力。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">从</span> Web-IDE <span style=\"font-family:宋体\">演进为 </span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Cloud-Native IDE</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">；离业务层更接近的云原生标准去串联起整个研发平台；开发者工具从本地工作到云端协作；更多云原生研发平台涌现与云原生技术融合贯通，为企业提供开箱即用的新技术解决方案；企业的私有技术壁垒被打破，且采纳云上现成的云原生产品来改造自身的技术体系。技术的收敛带来了统一数据规范的可能，而数据是所有智能化的基石。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">云原生最大的挑战是兑现新技术给业务带去的价值，传统行业仍然存在大量的物理机和虚拟机时代，受资产状况的影响很难很快将核心业务迁移到云原生之上，而体会到新技术的巨大价值；应用容器的企业，在软件资产上曾持续的投入了大量的资源做建设，从功能上看已经建立了与云原生同等的软件资产，不会很快从自建转为云原生。这些市场面对新技术的正常姿态，行业用户在两端正在被改变。云原生需要更多的将基础能力建设好、需要更多新技术价值的洞察，来更多的为企业兑现业务价值、创造行业趋势，成为云计算发展最大的里程。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">迎接智能新时代：数据中心、</span>AI<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Times New Roman\">5G……</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新电能：</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">迄今为止，人工智能已经发展了</span>60<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">多年，得益于互联网时代的数据积累、半导体设计、芯片运算能力、制造工艺进步等，深度学习结合强化学习带来的计算机视觉、语音技术、自然语音处理技术应用更精准，作为第四次革命的重要技术，改变医疗、交通、娱乐、制造业等，极大丰富了我们的服务场景。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图3-人工智能行业结构.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图3-人工智能行业结构-993x1024.png\" title=\"图3-人工智能行业结构-993x1024.png\" alt=\"图3-人工智能行业结构.png\"/></a></span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">（</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">资料来源：恒大研究院</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">）</span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">底层支撑：</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">历史</span></span><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">证明，前瞻性的基础设施建设可转化为产业生态优势。</span>5G<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">与工业互联网、车联网、人工智能等垂直行业应用融合发展。在数字化背景下，</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">就像</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">信息高速公路</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">补齐了制约</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、大数据、工业互联网在信息传输、连接规模、通信质量上的短板；</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">像云端大脑，依赖</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">高速公路</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">传输的信息和演化，完成机器智能化；工业互联网如同桥梁，依赖</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">连接人、机、物，推动制造到智能。加快推动工业互联网、车联网、智能交通、智慧医疗、超高清视频等垂直行业融合，才能充分赋能</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图4-中国无线通信发展.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图4-中国无线通信发展-1024x797.png\" title=\"图4-中国无线通信发展-1024x797.png\" alt=\"图4-中国无线通信发展.png\"/></a></span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">（</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">插入图片</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\">4<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">标明资料来源</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">：</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\">C114<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">通信网、恒大研究院）</span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-indent: 2em;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">新型生产要素：</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">随着数字经济的发展，催生了海量数据需求，数据中心应用而生，成为数据集中计算、传输、存储的</span>“<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">图书馆</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，数据中心的建设成为企业和政府的高度重视，也成为新基建的核心领域之一。数据中心是一个由需求决定的市场，下游需求变化决定了数据中心产业链的未来走势。新技术和新模式的发展应用，均以海量数据为支撑，反过来带动数据量的爆发增长和新数据需求。短期高清视频驱动中时延数据爆发，中长期</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、智能驾驶为核心低时延数据占比提升。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图5-5G三大应用场景及相关领域商用化进程.jpg\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图5-5G三大应用场景及相关领域商用化进程.jpg\" title=\"图5-5G三大应用场景及相关领域商用化进程.jpg\" alt=\"图5-5G三大应用场景及相关领域商用化进程.jpg\"/></a></span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">（</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">资料来源：中国信通院、华为、恒大研究院）</span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">由于数据的生产和使用涉及消费者、平台、运营商、服务商等多环节，数据在每个环节被加工整合，难以统一管理，</span></span><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">决定我们需要关注</span>AI<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">的人伦道德、技术标准、人文关系、数据安全等问题。</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">未来，</span>AI<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">将与数据中心、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">5G</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等一起推动数字经济时代的产业转型升级，是关乎未来的制高点。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">企业动向</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">阿里、</span>AWS<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、微软、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Facebook</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">ebay </span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、华为、腾讯等厂商都在积极布局智能化工具，从传统的</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">代码</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">智能工具逐步扩展到</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">“</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">服务</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">智能工具。比如最近 </span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AWS </span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">发布的</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">CodeGuru</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，它是一个用于代码审查自动化和性能优化推荐的机器学习服务。它能找出最影响程序性能的代码行，并让提供修复或改进代码的具体建议。这就是代码大数据和运行时服务大数据结合的智能工具。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">诸多金融科技企业将</span>‘IAAS+PAAS“<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">一体化建设和运维服务，构建下一代数字化金融基础架构。实现</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">IT</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">基础设施云化、核心技术互联网化和应用数智化，无论是中国的经济发展、金融市场建设、技术进步、互联网发展进程等行业的多态，都在加速进入数字化时代智能化基础设施。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图6-企业数字化时代动向.jpg\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图6-企业数字化时代动向-1024x576.jpg\" title=\"图6-企业数字化时代动向-1024x576.jpg\" alt=\"图6-企业数字化时代动向.jpg\"/></a></span></span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; text-indent: 28px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">（</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">企业数字化时代动向</span></span></em><em><span style=\"font-family: Calibri;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">）</span></span></em></p>\n<p><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">我们本届将要亮相的各个企业，故事很长很精彩</span>,<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">都在这里</span><span style=\"font-family:Times New Roman\">,</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">欢迎您的到来</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">今天技术和数字化元素，正在颠覆我们的生活、工作和互相关联的方式，新的商业模式的出现、生产消费、运输与交付体系被重塑。对于所有的行业和企业而言，商业的颠覆不会以任何的意志为转移，互联网技术和数字化生存带来非常多的商业模式创新，新型的企业成长模式，导致传统企业加快了互联网化或数字化。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top: 0;margin-right: 0;margin-bottom: 0;text-indent: 28px;padding: 0\"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">百林哲携手国内外一线技术嘉宾，微软、谷歌、阿里巴巴、百度、腾讯、蚂蚁金服、华为、字节跳动、</span>58<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、旷视、哔哩哔哩、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">oppo</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、携程、普元、京东、美团、小米、海康、奇安信等知名企业共同输出，从组织数字化转型、精益创新、研发效能、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">产品创新、用户增长、云原生、架构创新、微服务、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">AI</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">大数据、数据安全和云安全、云数据库、业务驱动的</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">DEVOPS</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">和智能运维等多维度，助力技术领导者和开发者，深度分享和交流，新技术、新模式下的方法和实践。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:16px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span &#39;Times New Roman&#39;\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">特别鸣谢</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times Calibri;font-size: 14px\">&#160;</span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 16px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">点击图片立即报名</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><strong><span alt=\"图12-报名二维码.png\"/></a></span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph\"><em><span style=\"font-family: 宋体;font-size: 14px\">&#160;</span></em></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: 宋体\">2020 CSDI的结尾</span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">马克思的墓志铭说</span>“<span style=\"font-family:宋体\">全世界的哲学家在想法设法解释这个世界，但是问题在于改变世界</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">”</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">，今天每一位管理者和开发者，都感受到互联网技术和数字技术带来的变化，也在试图解释，但正如马克思的墓志铭所说，我们更需要推动改变的思考和研究。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;text-indent:28px;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">互联网技术把数据、协同、智能等生产要素高效组合，整个商业系统被重构。无论是中国企业还是世界企业，都站在同一起跑线。我们需要深深扎根在这片挚爱的土地上，矢志不渝的钻研和传播优秀企业管理实践的曼妙，就有更多的机会分享更多技术创新的价值。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\">&#160;</span></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 ;text-align:center\"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 16px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">精彩回顾</span></span></strong></p>\n<p style=\"margin-top:0;margin-right:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-left:0;padding:0 0 0 0 \"><strong><span style=\"font-family: &#39;Times New Roman&#39;;font-size: 14px\"><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">往期参会企业：</span></span></strong><span style=\";font-family:Calibri;font-size:14px\"><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">facebook</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、汇量科技、快手、猎豹移动、百分点、达观数据、格林深瞳、摩拜单车、国美金融、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Google</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">ZingFront</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、亚联超银、景驰科技、链人、唯品会、阿里云、融</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">360</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、新译科技、玖富、旷视科技、复旦大学、蚂蚁金服、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">YonghongTech</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、图灵机器人、科大讯飞、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">TutorABC</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、知衣科技、腾讯云、中信云、京东金融、思源、今日头条、贝壳、中国科学院、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">TUPUTECH</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Huobi</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、苏宁金融、东南大学、日海物联、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">UCBrowser</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">Offerlook</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">、</span><span style=\"font-family:Calibri\">SAP</span><span style=\"font-family:宋体\">等。</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"margin: 0px; padding: 0px; text-align: center;\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图13-往期会场现场.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/图13-往期会场现场-1024x310.png\" title=\"图13-往期会场现场-1024x310.png\" alt=\"图13-往期会场现场.png\"/></a></p>\n<p><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">不过应该是靶场的原因，这个cms还是比较多公开漏洞getshell的方式，后台模板功能直接写一句话到index.php中。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104802.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">一键连上。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104804.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">拿到webshell后，收集当前信息。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-15991048041.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">直接就是一个管理员了，正常环境一般还需要提权操作，通过系统补丁情况来使用msf模块提权。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">既然是管理员就直接添加用户了。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104805.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">查看端口，发现没开3389。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-15991048051.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">改注册表键值开启3389。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104806.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">成功开启3389，但mstsc连不上，可能是被防火墙拦了，尝试关闭防火墙（动静比较大，建议使用命令配置防火墙策略允许3389端口放行）。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-15991048061.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">成功登陆上web服务器。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><br/></p>\n<section>\n<section style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<section style=\"border-bottom: 4px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;text-align: left;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"border-bottom: 8px solid rgb(51, 51, 51);border-top-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-right-color: rgb(51, 51, 221);color: rgb(221, 221, 221);font-size: 18px;line-height: 1.5em;background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);\"><span style=\"color: #333333;\"><strong style=\"border-color: #ddd;color: inherit;\">进入内网</strong></span></p>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">进行内网信息收集，IP信息，得知外网IP 192.168.1.12和内网IP192.168.52.143，已经存在AD域，网段为192.168.52.0。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">当前登录域及登录用户信息net config Workstation。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">判断主域 net time /domain，主域一般用作时间服务器，这台明显不是。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">收集一些其他的内网信息......</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: SimSun;\">为了方便，用msfvenom生成个powershell反弹到msf。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">要抓取服务器密码hash权限不够，需要提权，getsystem失败，（也不建议用，动静比较大），用msf自带的补丁检测看看有没有能利用的漏洞。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">发现好像都不适用，用Windows ExploitSuggester再查了一下，发现可以使用ms16-014，并成功提到system权限。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">这边拿到的是一个shell，把它转成meterpreter，即session 4。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">在当前目录下传个mimikatz。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">用debug模式成功跑出管理员密码。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104818.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">并且得到了域控的账户密码 administrator/hongrisec@2020。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><br/></p>\n<section>\n<section style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<section style=\"border-bottom: 4px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;text-align: left;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"border-bottom: 8px solid rgb(51, 51, 51);border-top-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-right-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-left-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-size: 14px;line-height: 20px;display: inline-block;margin-bottom: -5px;color: inherit;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<p style=\"border-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);color: rgb(221, 221, 221);font-size: 18px;line-height: 1.5em;background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);\"><span style=\"color: #333333;\"><strong style=\"border-color: #ddd;color: inherit;\">横向渗透</strong></span></p>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">刚才说内网网段是192.168.52.0，配置静态路由。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"text-align: center;white-space: normal;width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104820.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">然后用netbios协议扫描域网段，得到IP为192.168.52.138、192.168.52.141两台存活主机。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"text-align: center;white-space: normal;width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104821.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">对两台主机扫一下看看有没有ms17-010。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104822.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">由于永恒之蓝打Windows server 2003容易蓝屏，网上查了一些姿势。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">使用ms17_010_command模块执行系统命令，添加用户至管理员。再配合用户名密码使用ms17_010_psexec模块。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104823.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">拿到的是system权限，添加用户test2并加到管理员组。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104825.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104827.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">执行成功，但是没有拿到shell，不知道什么原因。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104829.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">那就直接rdp登录算了，配置socks4a代理。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">然后用proxychains rdesktop 登录。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">这边还用了ms17_010_command开了3389端口：</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104832.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">msfvenom -p windows/meterpreter/bind_tcp</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">-e x86/shikata_ga_nai -i 5LPORT=6666 -f exe</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">用msfvenom生成一个正向马传进去（因为无法访问外网，反向出不来），msf正向连接。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104833.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">这样获得域用户，2003直接getsystem，最终拿到域用户192.168.52.141的system权限。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104834.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">跑出administrator用户密码也为hongrisec@2020。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><br/></p>\n<section style=\"white-space: normal;\">\n<section style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<section style=\"margin-top: 10px;margin-bottom: 10px;border-bottom: 4px solid rgb(221, 221, 221);text-align: left;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<section style=\"margin-bottom: -5px;border-bottom: 8px solid rgb(51, 51, 51);border-top-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-right-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-left-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-size: 14px;line-height: 20px;display: inline-block;color: inherit;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<p style=\"border-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);color: rgb(221, 221, 221);font-size: 18px;line-height: 1.5em;background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);\"><span style=\"color: #333333;\"><strong style=\"border-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);color: inherit;\">获得域控</strong></span></p>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n</section>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">域控已经知道IP为192.168.52.138，且ms17-010的补丁未打，这边也和域用户一样获得shell。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;\">通过代理上传msf马，正向连接s:</span></span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-1599104835.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">由于已经知道了DC的账户密码，看了网上的教程，还可以使用wmiexec来命令执行，参考：[http://www.91ri.org/12908.html]</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">进入刚才的web服务器shell，把wmiexec.vbs传上去。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">用DC的账户密码执行命令成功。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\" src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/1970/01/beepress-image-140298-15991048351.png\"/></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">最终获得所有权限，后续还有权限维持和清除痕迹，由于时间有限没有继续。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">后续再进行可以尝试。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"\" 51);border-top-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-right-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);border-left-color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-size: 14px;line-height: 20px;display: inline-block;margin-bottom: -5px;color: inherit;box-sizing: border-box;\">\n<p style=\"border-color: rgb(221, 221, 221);color: rgb(221, 221, 221);font-size: 18px;line-height: 1.5em;background-color: rgb(254, 254, 254);\"><span 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: 16px;line-height: 1.75em;letter-spacing: 2.5px;font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-size: 15px;color: #585858;font-family: 宋体, SimSun;\">最近也是刚接触内网渗透，很多知识点掌握的不是很好，参考了网上很多的资料。</span></p>\n<p style=\"box-sizing: border-box;orphans: 4;margin: 0.8em 5px;white-space: pre-wrap;font-size: SimSun;\">通过整个环境的搭建和查阅资料，对内网有了一个简单的了解，学到了很多，有不足之处还请多多指出。</span></p>\n<p style=\"text-align: center;\"><img class=\"rich_pages js_insertlocalimg\" style=\"width: 100%;height: auto;\"
