&#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">2020年7月，Oracle Weblogic发布了包含编号为CVE-2020-14645漏洞的CPU。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n5\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">CVE-2020-14645使用T3协议进行攻击，威力巨大，CVSS 3.0达到</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">9.8</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，利用</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">UniversalExtractor</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">类进行反序列化攻击，完成远程命令执行。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n6\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">影响版本众多，具体包含：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n7\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n9\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">10.3.6.0.0</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n11\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">12.1.3.0.0</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n13\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">12.2.1.3.0</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n15\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">12.2.1.4.0</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n17\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">14.1.1.0.0</span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n18\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h1 cid=\"n19\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 2.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.2;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI </span></h1>\n<p cid=\"n20\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">是远程方法调用的简称，能够帮助我们查找并执行远程对象的方法。通俗地说，远程调用就象将一个</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">class</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">放在A机器上，然后在B机器中调用这个</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">class</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的方法。</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n21\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n23\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">（</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Remote Method Invocation</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">），为远程方法调用，是允许运行在一个Java虚拟机的对象调用运行在另一个Java虚拟机上的对象的方法。 这两个虚拟机可以是运行在相同计算机上的不同进程中，也可以是运行在网络上的不同计算机中。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n25\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Java RMI</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">（</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Java Remote Method Invocation</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">），是Java编程语言里一种用于实现远程过程调用的应用程序编程接口。它使客户机上运行的程序可以调用远程服务器上的对象。远程方法调用特性使Java编程人员能够在网络环境中分布操作。RMI全部的宗旨就是尽可能简化远程接口对象的使用。</span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n26\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">从客户端-服务器模型来看，客户端程序直接调用服务端，两者之间是通过</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">JRMP</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">（ </span><span md-inline=\"link\" class=\"md-meta-i-c  md-link\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><a spellcheck=\"false\" href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_Remote_Method_Protocol\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;cursor: pointer;color: rgb(65, 131, 196);-webkit-user-drag: none\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">Java Remote Method Protocol</span></a></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">）协议通信，这个协议类似于HTTP协议，规定了客户端和服务端通信要满足的规范。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n27\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h2 cid=\"n28\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.75em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.225;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI 代理模式</span></h2>\n<h3 cid=\"n29\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.5em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.43;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">概念</span></h3>\n<h4 cid=\"n30\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">Stub和Skeleton</span></h4>\n<p cid=\"n31\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI的客户端和服务器并不直接通信，客户与远程对象之间采用的代理方式进行</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Socket</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">通信。为远程对象分别生成了客户端代理和服务端代理，其中位于客户端的代理类称为Stub即存根（包含服务器</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">信息），位于服务端的代理类称为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">即骨干网。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n32\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h4 cid=\"n33\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI Registry</span></h4>\n<p cid=\"n34\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI注册表</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，默认监听在</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">1099</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">端口上，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Client</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">通过</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">向</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">查询，得到这个绑定关系和对应的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n35\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h4 cid=\"n36\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">远程对象</span></h4>\n<p cid=\"n37\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">远程对象是存在于服务端以供客户端调用方法的对象。任何可以被远程调用的对象都必须实现</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.Remote</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">接口，远程对象的实现类必须继承</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">UnicastRemoteObject</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">类。这个远程对象中可能有很多个函数，但是只有在远程接口中声明的函数才能被远程调用，其他的公共函数只能在本地的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">JVM</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">中使用。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n38\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h4 cid=\"n39\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">序列化传输数据</span></h4>\n<p cid=\"n40\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端远程调用时传递给服务器的参数，服务器执行后的传递给客户端的返回值。参数或者返回值，在传输的时会被序列化，在被接受时会被反序列化。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n41\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">因此这些传输的对象必须可以被序列化，相应的类必须实现</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.io.Serializable</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">接口，并且客户端的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">serialVersionUID</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">字段要与服务器端保持一致。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n42\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h3 cid=\"n43\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.5em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.43;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">结构流程</span></h3>\n<p cid=\"n44\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">远程方法调用通讯结构图：</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n45\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610115126583.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610115126583-1024x600.png\" title=\"image-20200610115126583-1024x600.png\" alt=\"image-20200610115126583.png\"/></a></p>\n<ul cid=\"n47\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n49\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务端创建远程对象，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">侦听一个随机的端口，以供客户端调用。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n51\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">启动，注册远程对象，通过</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">和远程对象进行关联绑定，以供客户端进行查询。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n53\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端对</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">发起请求，根据提供的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">得到</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n55\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">中包含与</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">通信的信息（地址，端口等），两者建立通信，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">作为客户端代理请求服务端代理</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">并进行远程方法调用。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n57\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务端代理</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">调用远程方法，调用结果先返回给</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">再返回给客户端</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">再返回给客户端本身。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n58\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.5rem;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><br/></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n59\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">从逻辑上来看，数据是在</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Client</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">和</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Server</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">之间横向流动的，但是实际上是从</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Client</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">到</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，然后从</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Skeleton</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">到</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Server</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">这样纵向流动的，如下图所示：</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n60\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610111952591.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610111952591.png\" title=\"image-20200610111952591.png\" alt=\"image-20200610111952591.png\"/></a></p>\n<p cid=\"n61\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">这里执行远程对象的方法的是RMI通讯的服务端，为攻击服务端的方式</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n62\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h3 cid=\"n63\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.5em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.43;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">代码</span></h3>\n<ul cid=\"n64\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n66\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">定义一个接口，继承</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.Remote</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，并且接口中的全部方法抛出</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RemoteException</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">异常。</span></p>\n<pre spellcheck=\"false\" class=\"md-fences md-end-block ty-contain-cm modeLoaded\" cid=\"n74\" mdtype=\"fences\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;overflow: visible;font-family: var(--monospace);font-size: 0.9em;break-inside: avoid;white-space: normal;background-image: inherit;background-position: inherit;background-size: inherit;background-repeat: inherit;background-attachment: inherit;background-origin: inherit;background-clip: inherit;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);border-radius: 3px;padding: 8px 4px 6px;margin-bottom: 15px;margin-top: 15px;width: inherit;position: relative !important\"><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #770088\">package</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #0000FF\">RMI</span>;</span><br/><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span cm-text=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"></span></span><br/><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #770088\">import</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">java</span>.<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">rmi</span>.<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">Remote</span>;</span><br/><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #770088\">import</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">java</span>.<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">rmi</span>.<span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #000000\">RemoteException</span>;</span><br/><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span cm-text=\"\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"></span></span><br/><span role=\"presentation\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;padding-right: 0.1px\"><span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #770088\">public</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #770088\">interface</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: border-box;color: #0000FF\">RemoteHello</span> <span style=\"box-sizing: sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">攻击RMI</span></h3>\n<p cid=\"n87\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI的客户端与服务端通信内容为序列化数据，客户端和服务端可以相互进行反序列化攻击。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n88\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h4 cid=\"n89\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">本地利用</span></h4>\n<p cid=\"n90\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">通常设定的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">CLASSPATH</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">可称为“本地代码库”，磁盘上加载本地类的位置的列表。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n91\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">环境：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n92\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n94\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务端JDK版本为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">JDK1.7u21</code></span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n96\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务端存在</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Commons-Collections3.1</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">或其他可利用组件。</span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h5 cid=\"n97\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">攻击服务端</span></h5>\n<p cid=\"n98\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">如果客户端传递给服务端恶意序列化数据，服务端反序列化时调用</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">readObject</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">就会遭到攻击。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n99\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<p cid=\"n100\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, border-box\">客户端攻击POC：</span></p>\n<pre spellcheck=\"false\" class=\"md-fences md-end-block ty-contain-cm modeLoaded\" cid=\"n101\" mdtype=\"fences\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;overflow: cursor: text; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: &#34;Open Sans&#34;, &#34;Clear Sans&#34;, &#34;Helvetica Neue&#34;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">Java™平台最重要的功能之一是能够将Java类组件从任何统一资源定位器（URL）动态下载到通常在不同物理系统上，以单独进程运行的虚拟机（VM）的能力。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n110\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">Java RMI利用此功能下载和执行类，使用Java RMI API，不仅浏览器中的VM，任何VM都可以下载任何Java类文件，包括专门的Java RMI存根类，这些类可以使用服务器系统的资源在远程服务器上执行方法调用。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n111\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.codebase</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">属性值表示一个或多个URL位置，可以从中下载所需的资源。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n112\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">受害端使用该属性远程动态加载需要两个条件：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n113\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n115\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.useCodebaseOnly</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的值为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">false</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">true</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">时，禁用自动加载远程，仅从</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">CLASSPATH</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">和当前虚拟机的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.codebase</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">指定路径加载类文件。从</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">JDK 6u45</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">、</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">7u21</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">开始，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.useCodebaseOnly</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的默认值就是</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">true</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n117\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">设置</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">securityManager</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">和</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.security.policy</code></span></p>\n<p cid=\"n118\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.5rem;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><br/></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<h5 cid=\"n119\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.4;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端加载</span></h5>\n<p cid=\"n120\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI中</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI client</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">利用远程动态加载代码示意图如下：</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n121\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">创建HTTP服务器，作为动态加载代码的远程仓库。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n126\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务端创建远程对象，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">启动并完成名称绑定，并设置</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.codebase</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n128\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">发起请求，，根据提供的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">得到</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Stub</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，并根据服务器返回的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java.rmi.server.codebase</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">远程加载动态所需的类。（客户端也可以自行指定</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color:
