Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h2 cid=\"n156\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.75em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.225;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI 工厂模式</span></h2>\n<p cid=\"n157\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">除了代理模式，RMI还存在经典的工厂模式，流程图如下：</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n158\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610152813280.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200610152813280.png\" title=\"image-20200610152813280.png\" alt=\"image-20200610152813280.png\"/></a></p>\n<p cid=\"n159\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">ProductImp</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">为远程对象，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">对象指向</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">ProductImp对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，大致流程如下：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n160\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n162\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">创建</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，设置</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">指向ProductImp</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">（通过HTTP等协议定位，可以位于其他服务器），具有指向功能的对象也可以叫做</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">reference对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n164\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">服务器端的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">启动，创建并注册</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">reference对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">（指向</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">），通过</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">和</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">reference对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">进行关联绑定，以供客户端进行查询。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n166\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端对</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI Registry</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">发起请求，根据提供的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">Name</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">得到指向</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">reference对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n168\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端加载</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">到本地，并调用</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">FactoryImpl对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的方法，得到指向</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">ProductImp对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">reference对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">。</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n170\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">客户端加载</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">ProductImp对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">到本地，并调用</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">ProductImp对象</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">的方法，得到最终结果。</span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n171\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<p cid=\"n172\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">这里执行远程对象的方法的是RMI通讯的客户端，为攻击客户端的方式，是在具体的代码和利用场景可以参考FastJson中的JNDI注入。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n174\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h1 cid=\"n175\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 2.25em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.2;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">JNDI</span></h1>\n<h2 cid=\"n176\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.75em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.225;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">定义</span></h2>\n<p cid=\"n177\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">JNDI（Java Naming and Directory Interface），是SUN公司提供的一种标准的Java命名系统接口。为开发人员提供了查找和访问各种命名和目录服务的通用、统一的接口，类似JDBC都是构建在抽象层上。现在JNDI已经成为J2EE的标准之一，所有的J2EE容器都必须提供一个JNDI的服务。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n179\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><a href=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200612135446540.png\" class=\"zoomImg\"><img src=\"https://secpulseoss.oss-cn-shanghai.aliyuncs.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/image-20200612135446540-1024x711.png\" title=\"image-20200612135446540-1024x711.png\" alt=\"image-20200612135446540.png\"/></a></p>\n<p cid=\"n180\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">JNDI由JNDI API、命名管理、JNDI SPI（service provider interface）服务提供的接口。我们的应用可以通过JNDI的API去访问相关服务提供的接口。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n181\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">我们要使用JNDI，必须要有服务提供方，我们常用的就是JDBC驱动提供数据库连接服务，然后我们配置JNDI连接。。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n182\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">JDK也为我们提供了一些服务接口：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n183\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n185\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">LDAP （Lightweight Directory Access Protocol） 轻量级目录访问协议</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n187\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">CORBA （Common Object Request Broker Architecture） 公共对象请求代理结构服务</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n189\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI（Java Remote Method Invocation）JAVA远程远程方法调用注册</span></p>\n</li>\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n191\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">DNS（Domain Name Service）域名服务</span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n192\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">漏洞中涉及到最多的就是</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">RMI</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">LDAP</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">两种服务接口</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n193\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h2 cid=\"n194\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.75em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.225;cursor: text;border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238);white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">JNDI注入</span></h2>\n<p cid=\"n195\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">当</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">lookup</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">函数的参数</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">url</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">可控时，就是所谓的JNDI注入，使用的其实就是工厂模式。</span></p>\n<p cid=\"n196\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<h3 cid=\"n197\" mdtype=\"heading\" class=\"md-end-block md-heading\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;break-after: avoid-page;break-inside: avoid;orphans: 4;font-size: 1.5em;margin-top: 1rem;margin-bottom: 1rem;position: relative;line-height: 1.43;cursor: text;white-space: pre-wrap;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">RMI协议</span></h3>\n<p cid=\"n198\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">测试环境：</span></p>\n<ul cid=\"n199\" mdtype=\"list\" data-mark=\"-\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;padding-left: 30px;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;white-space: normal\" class=\" list-paddingleft-2\">\n<li>\n<p cid=\"n201\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0px;margin-bottom: 0.5rem;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative\"><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">com.sun.jndi.rmi.object.trustURLCodebase</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"> 为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">true</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">JDK 6u132</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">、</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">7u122</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">、</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">8u113</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"> 开始默认为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">false</code></span><span md-inline=\"plain\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\">，测试环境为</span><span md-inline=\"code\" spellcheck=\"false\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box\"><code style=\"box-sizing: border-box;font-family: var(--monospace);vertical-align: initial;border: 1px solid rgb(231, 234, 237);background-color: rgb(243, 244, 244);border-radius: 3px;padding: 0px 2px;font-size: 0.9em\">java version &#34;1.8.0_112&#34;</code></span></p>\n</li>\n</ul>\n<p cid=\"n202\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size: 16px\"><br/></p>\n<p cid=\"n203\" mdtype=\"paragraph\" class=\"md-end-block md-p\" style=\"box-sizing: border-box;line-height: inherit;orphans: 4;margin-top: 0.8em;margin-bottom: 0.8em;white-space: pre-wrap;position: relative;color: rgb(51, 51, 51);font-family: &#39;Open Sans&#39;, &#39;Clear Sans&#39;, &#39;Helvetica Neue&#39;, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;font-size:
